name: MazezaM
description:
Get your retro 80's fix with this ingenious puzzle game.  Similar to Sokoban you push rows of blocks left or right so you can get through the maze, your goal is to get the key on the other side.  Included are 30 stages that get increasingly more complex.

Presented with a CRT like filter and scan lines the visuals are simple but nostalgic and the game play should keep you coming back until you finish it.

This game is free please consider a donation if you enjoy it and want more games.

MazezaM is a puzzle game that was created by Malcolm Tyrrell for the ZX Spectrum in 2002.  Released under the GNU Public License (GPL). 

FEATURES

  • 30 Stages
  • FREE and FULL game
  • Auto save progress
  • Undo moves
